body: I'm not saying liking loli's are something that should be normal or anything, I'm just using it as an example over the fact that there are certain boundaries that shouldn't be crossed, and this one has clearly crossed way too far than most fetishes.

It's fine to be into certain fetishes, but there are clearly some things that shouldn't be normalized even if it's just drawings and animations. If you like loli tags, it's fine, until you actually start liking actual little children, then that's gonna be a real issue. But in matters of morality, this is clearly just something that shouldn't be a thing, no matter how many times you can excuse it being "just a drawing/animation"

@daddySpanks311 I'ma tell you something shithead. First of all, he posted it again because its an update, not because he wants attention or something. Second of all, just because YOU don't like it doesn't mean that you have to write a hate comment on it and start bringing up things like his mother. Do you really think all artists that make something you don't like, for example necrophilia, are like that? Overweight? Neets? Yes there are ppl fapping to this. But there are worse things, at least for me. For example, I completely dislike scat. But you know what? I don't go to Dojins about scat and start commenting how much I hate them or how fucked up the ppl who read it are, because there are ppl who like it and I respect that. You are just a disrespectful little shit. Would you like me talking like that to you? Maybe you are the one living with your mother. Maybe SHE is sick of YOU. I'm just disgusted by ppl like you. If you don't like it, fucking blacklist it ffs. Who agrees with me?
